definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: We of the Ashtar Galactic Command thank you for your attention.

sentences.english: Sita scraped a shallow cavity low down in the wall.

sentences.english: Indian sitar music works best, followed by classical music.
sentences.chinese: 印度西塔琴音乐效果最好，其次是古典音乐。

sentences.english: SLASH : I do have a very nice sitar that I got from India. Inever play it though. LOL!
sentences.chinese: 我确实有一把不错的西塔尔琴，从印度带来的。

sentences.english: Optimizer bugfix for single step Gain values on 90 degree Theta using perfect-ground.
sentences.chinese: 优化修正错误的西塔使用完美地面单步增益值90度。
